verses.text: Moreover the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto Jeremiah the second time, while he was yet shut up in the court of the prison , saying ,

Thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* the maker thereof, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* that formed it, to establish it; the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* his name ;  +  r 33.2  t the \+nd LORD\+nd* is: or, \+nd JEHOVAH\+nd*, etc *
Call unto me, and I will answer thee, and shew thee great and mighty things , which thou knowest not.\f + \fr 33.3 \ft mighty: or, hidden\f*

For thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the God of Israel , concerning the houses of this city , and concerning the houses of the kings of Judah , which are thrown down by the mounts , and by the sword ;

They come to fight with the Chaldeans , but \add it is\add* to fill them with the dead bodies of men , whom I have slain in mine anger and in my fury , and for all whose wickedness I have hid my face from this city.
Behold, I will bring it health and cure , and I will cure them, and will reveal unto them the abundance of peace and truth.
And I will cause the captivity of Judah and the captivity of Israel to return , and will build them, as at the first.

And I will cleanse them from all their iniquity , whereby they have sinned against me; and I will pardon all their iniquities , whereby they have sinned , and whereby they have transgressed against me. \p

¶ And it shall be to me a name of joy , a praise and an honour before all the nations of the earth , which shall hear all the good that I do unto them: and they shall fear and tremble for all the goodness and for all the prosperity that I procure unto it. \p

Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Again there shall be heard in this place , which ye say \add shall be\add* desolate without man and without beast , \add even\add* in the cities of Judah , and in the streets of Jerusalem , that are desolate , without man , and without inhabitant , and without beast ,

The voice of joy , and the voice of gladness , the voice of the bridegroom , and the voice of the bride , the voice of them that shall say , Praise the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts : for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* good ; for his mercy \add endureth\add* for ever : \add and\add* of them that shall bring the sacrifice of praise into the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. For I will cause to return the captivity of the land , as at the first , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts ; Again in this place , which is desolate without man and without beast , and in all the cities thereof, shall be an habitation of shepherds causing \add their\add* flocks to lie down.

In the cities of the mountains , in the cities of the vale , and in the cities of the south , and in the land of Benjamin , and in the places about Jerusalem , and in the cities of Judah , shall the flocks pass again under the hands of him that telleth \add them\add*, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
Behold, the days come , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that I will perform that good thing which I have promised unto the house of Israel and to the house of Judah. \p
¶ In those days , and at that time , will I cause the Branch of righteousness to grow up unto David ; and he shall execute judgment and righteousness in the land.

In those days shall Judah be saved , and Jerusalem shall dwell safely : and this \add is the name\add* wherewith she shall be called , The \nd LORD\nd* our righteousness.\f + \fr 33.16 \ft The \+nd LORD\+nd*…: Heb. Jehovah-tsidkenu\f* \p

¶ For thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; David shall never want a man to sit upon the throne of the house of Israel ;\f + \fr 33.17 \ft David…: Heb. There shall not be cut off from David\f*
Neither shall the priests the Levites want a man before me to offer burnt offerings , and to kindle meat offerings , and to do sacrifice continually. \p
¶ And the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto Jeremiah , saying ,
Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; If ye can break my covenant of the day , and my covenant of the night , and that there should not be day and night in their season ;
\add Then\add* may also my covenant be broken with David my servant , that he should not have a son to reign upon his throne ; and with the Levites the priests , my ministers.
As the host of heaven cannot be numbered , neither the sand of the sea measured : so will I multiply the seed of David my servant , and the Levites that minister unto me.
Moreover the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to Jeremiah , saying ,

Considerest thou not what this people have spoken , saying , The two families which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath chosen , he hath even cast them off ? thus they have despised my people , that they should be no more a nation before them.
Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; If my covenant \add be\add* not with day and night , \add and if\add* I have not appointed the ordinances of heaven and earth ;

Then will I cast away the seed of Jacob , and David my servant , \add so\add* that I will not take \add any\add* of his seed \add to be\add* rulers over the seed of Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob : for I will cause their captivity to return , and have mercy on them.
